an5.18:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya.
an5.18:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attana na silasampanno hoti, param silasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.18:1.4: attana na samadhisampanno hoti, param samadhisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.18:1.5: attana na pannasampanno hoti, param pannasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.18:1.6: attana na vimuttisampanno hoti, param vimuttisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.18:1.7: attana na vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, param vimuttinanadassanasampadaya samadapeti.
an5.18:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya”ti.
